name: Little Submarine
description:
The little Submarine needs your help!

Help the little submarine push fishes out of the way and activate strange buttons with them to reach the mysterious underwater cave with the biggest treasure you can imagine!

Created for the Ludum Dare 48 Game Jam in under 48h

Controls

WASD or Arrow Keys - Move the Submarine

R - Undo last move (undo up to 1000 moves)

P - Pause game
